summary: Testing complete for IST timezone (UTC+5:30) implementation. All backend and frontend features working correctly with Indian Standard Time.

ist_timezone_definition.description: IST defined as UTC+5:30 timezone in backend
verified_elements: IST = timezone(timedelta(hours=5, minutes=30))
get_ist_now() returns current datetime in IST
get_ist_today() returns date string in DD-MM-YYYY format

attendance_checkin_ist.description: Attendance check-in records time in IST format
verified_elements: Check-in time recorded as 05:50 AM IST
Date recorded as 05-02-2026 (DD-MM-YYYY IST format)
Employee dashboard shows Login time in IST (05:50 AM)

attendance_checkout_ist.description: Attendance check-out records time in IST format
verified_elements: Check-out time recorded in 12-hour AM/PM format (e.g., 01:04 PM)
Total hours calculated correctly
Clock Out button available after check-in

date_filters_ist.description: Date filters in Attendance, Reports pages work with IST dates
verified_elements: Attendance page From/To date pickers show 05/02/2026 format
Report page date pickers have calendar icons
Date filter API accepts DD-MM-YYYY format
Payroll page shows 'Payroll Management (01 Feb 2026 To 28 Feb 2026)'
Month picker shows 'Feb 2026' format
Working days calculated correctly (24 days for Feb 2026)
Attendance calendar shows dates 01-28 with day names
Current time displayed as 07:37:50 AM (IST)
Date shown as 'Thursday, February 5, 2026'
Today's Status shows Login time 05:50 AM
All timestamps in employee view use IST

jwt_expiration_utc.description: JWT token expiration correctly uses UTC for compatibility
verified_elements: JWT exp claim uses datetime.now(timezone.utc)
24-hour token expiration works correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: IST timezone (UTC+5:30) implementation verified. All datetime operations use IST: attendance check-in/out times, date pickers, payroll dates, employee dashboard. JWT expiration correctly uses UTC for compatibility. Date format is DD-MM-YYYY for storage, dd/mm/yyyy for display. Time format is 12-hour AM/PM for display, 24-hour for calculations.

verification_summary.employee_portal: VERIFIED - Dashboard shows IST clock and dates
verification_summary.jwt_handling: VERIFIED - JWT expiration uses UTC (correct for security)
